it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.weapons

Class AlternateFireWeapon

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.Card
      • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.ActivableCard
        • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.weapons.WeaponCard
          • it.polimi.se2019.model.cards.weapons.AlternateFireWeapon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Representable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Electroscythe, Flamethrower, Furnace, Hellion, PowerGlove, Railgun, Shockwave, Shotgun, Sledgehammer, TractorBeam, ZX_2

    public abstract class AlternateFireWeapon
extends WeaponCard
    Weapons with an alternate fire method. The player can choose one of the two firing modes the weapon has.
    Author:
    Marchingegno
